nodes.text: The Algaran system, also known as the Algara system, was a star system located within the Lambda sector in the Mid Rim region of the galaxy. The system was placed directly on the Corellian Run and was centered around the star Algar. The system's main planet was Algara II, although it also included Kerilt, Krizzin, Tonder, Algara V and Algara VI.
